Exceptional tapas with Italian flair. Besides deliciously creative food they have an impressive wine selection, specializing in natural and organically grown wine. At first this place doesn't look anything special and certainly doesn't stand out from the rest. Oh, but wait till you get your food!! I usually have a favorite dish, the one that stands out through out the dinner. But not here. Every single plate we ordered was my favorite :)) and bursting with flavor. This is my "go to"place whenever friends or family are visiting. Everyone gets impressed every single time.
